UpperArmsDoorway.name: Doorway Biceps Stretch
UpperArmsDoorway.preparation: Stand at end of wall or in doorway facing perpendicular to wall. Position front of straight arm and palm on surface of wall. Situate arm around same height of shoulder with elbow positioned away from wall.
UpperArmsDoorway.execution: Turn body away from positioned arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
UpperArmsDoorway.comments: A stationary bar can also be used instead of wall.

UpperArmsSeated.name: Seated Biceps Stretch
UpperArmsSeated.preparation: Sit on floor or mat. Lean back and place hands flat on floor close together behind body with fingers positioned away from body.
UpperArmsSeated.execution: Scoot hips forward away from hands. Hold stretch.
UpperArmsSeated.comments: Instead of scooting hips forward, hands can be eased backwards.

UpperArmsPNFSeated.name: PNF Seated Biceps Stretch
UpperArmsPNFSeated.preparation: Instruct participant to sit on floor or bench and place arms to behind hips. From behind, grasp participants wrists, positioning them downward and close together.
UpperArmsPNFSeated.execution: Continue to raise participants arms upward behind their body. Hold stretch.
UpperArmsPNFSeated.comments: Participants wrists must continue to face downward. See PNF stretch techniques. Also see Seated Biceps Stretch for similar static stretch.

UpperArmsStanding.name: Standing Biceps Stretch
UpperArmsStanding.preparation: Clasp hands behind back with palms together. Straighten arms and rotate arms (inside down) so palm turn downward.
UpperArmsStanding.execution: Raise arms away from body. Hold stretch.

UpperArmsWall.name: Wall Biceps Stretch
UpperArmsWall.preparation: Face away from wall. Bend over and place hands close together as high as possible on wall with fingers positioned upward.
UpperArmsWall.execution: Bring rear end and back toward wall and squat down. Hold stretch for 20 seconds.
UpperArmsWall.comments: A stationary bar can also be used instead of wall.
